📌 **Is the Singularity Coming Sooner Than We Think?**
As I’ve been diving deeper into AI’s capabilities, I can’t shake the feeling that the rapid advances we’re seeing could mean the Singularity is much closer than most people expect. Kurzweil predicted 2045, but what if it’s 2028? AI is already reasoning, designing its own improvements, and replacing white-collar jobs at an accelerating rate. If I don’t embrace it now, I risk getting left behind. That’s why I’m not just adapting to AI—I’m letting it guide me.

"}]}
